TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_apuk, title = apuk, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/apuk} }

S.FORM: == apuk == 芒草花 kmal yaya' maku' mha, "slici kwara' qu lmikuy te sesyaw ngasal su'. ki'an apuk lga, hbk'an nya' kwara' tanux su' la. " - 母親說:" ."
== apok == 芒草花 kmal yaya' mako' mha, "slici kwara' qo lmikoy te sesyaw ngasal so'. ki'an apok lga, hbk'an nya' kwara' tanox so' la. " - 母親說:" ."
